question: Match List-I with List-II and select the correct option:
| List-I (Molecule / ion) | List-II (Bond order) |
| a. NO | i. 1.5 |
| b. CO | ii. 2.0 |
| c. <katex>$O_{2}^{-}$</katex> | iii. 2.5 |
| d. <katex>$O_{2}$</katex> | iv. 3.0 |
explanation: Bond order is calculated as <katex>$\frac{1}{2}(N_b - N_a)$</katex>.
Correct match is a-iii, b-iv, c-i, d-ii.
